title: Event CRUD
description:
Create event (name, type, time, location, max size)
Event list/calendar view
Event detail page
Edit/delete events
Role requirements (X tanks, Y healers, Z dps)
close_reason: Event CRUD complete: API endpoints (list, get, create, update, delete), frontend (list page, detail page, create/edit dialogs), Storybook stories, unit tests, security fix for signup tenant validation

title: Signup System
description:
Sign up with character
Signup statuses (confirmed, tentative, declined, standby)
Role-based roster view
Bench/standby management
Signup notes
close_reason: Signup System complete: signup-form.tsx (character selection, status, role, notes), signup-roster.tsx (grouped by role with progress bars), all signup statuses supported

title: Soft Reserve Integration

Item reservation UI
Soft reserve limits
View reserved items
close_reason: Soft Reserve Integration complete: schema, API endpoints (softReserve, removeSoftReserve, getSoftReserves), frontend components (soft-reserve-form, soft-reserve-list), Storybook stories, unit tests

title: 4.1.2 Event List Page
description: Build event list/calendar view. Show upcoming events with key info (name, type, date, signups count). Include filtering by type and past/future toggle.

title: Fix skipped role-router unit tests
description: 13 unit tests in role-router.test.ts are skipped due to complex mock setup issues. The mocks don't properly simulate the error scenarios. Options: 1) Fix the mock chains, 2) Convert to integration tests with test database, 3) Simplify by testing at a higher level.

title: Add Claude hooks for lint/format/type-check
close_reason: Claude hooks configured for lint/format/type-check via pre-push hook

title: Phase 8: External Integrations
description: Third-party data sources. Includes Battle.net, Warcraft Logs, and other integrations.

title: Battle.net Integration
description:
OAuth integration with Battle.net API

## Requirements
- OAuth integration for Battle.net authentication
- Character verification (confirm ownership)
- Pull character data:
  - Class
  - Level
  - Gear/equipment

## Technical Notes
- Use Battle.net OAuth 2.0 flow
- Store tokens securely
- Handle token refresh

title: Warcraft Logs Integration
description:
API integration with Warcraft Logs

## Requirements
- API integration with Warcraft Logs
- Pull raid logs for characters
- Performance metrics per character
- Link logs to guild events

## Technical Notes
- Requires verified Battle.net characters first
- Use WCL v2 GraphQL API
- Cache log data appropriately

title: Other External Integrations
description:
Additional third-party integrations

## Requirements

### ThatsMyBIS
- Integration with ThatsMyBIS
- Import/sync wishlists

### Softres.it
- Softres.it integration
- Soft reserve tracking

## Technical Notes
- These can be developed in parallel with other integrations
- Check API availability and rate limits

title: Phase 3: Roster & Character Management
description: Core data that other features depend on. Includes member management and character management.
close_reason: Phase 3 complete - Roster & Character Management implemented

title: Member list view - Display roster with member info, status indicators, and filtering/sorting options
Character profile with game data - Display character details including fetched game API data
Invite members - Generate shareable invite links with expiration and usage limits
Member profile pages - Individual member pages showing characters, roles, activity history
Custom roles system CRUD - Create, read, update, delete guild roles with names and colors
Assign roles to members - UI for assigning/removing roles from guild members
Role permissions matrix - Define granular permissions per role for guild features
Character list per member - Display all characters owned by a member with sorting and status
Add/edit character - Form for character name, realm, class, spec, and role selection
Set main character designation - Allow members to designate one character as their main
